Expand computer hard drive storage instantly! Add extra storage to your Desktop PC / Laptop Without opening up the case

body.description: Avolusion PRO-5X Series 12TB (12-Terabyte) External Hard Drive is the value hard drive upgrade kit provides the best and easy solution to expand your Desktop PC / Laptop storage capacity instantly! Plug and Play USB 3.0 interface providing a perfect portable storage solution for you to store & backup your game data, music, picture, video and more! Avolusion PRO-5X Series External Hard Drive designed to work with your Windows OS Desktop PC, Laptop perfectly! Fully compatible with any Windows OS devices. It comes with silent fan-less design to keep your External Hard Drive operate quietly! Avolusion PRO-5X Series External Hard Drive Upgrade Kit features high-quality construction, advanced external interface technology, durable chassis and state-of-the-art industrial design, assured to provide you with years of reliable performance. Features: UPC: 810064872280 Model: PRO5X-WH-12TB-WIN Built-in 12TB Capacity Hard Drive Compatible with Windows 11, 10, 8, 7 Windows NTFS File System Pre-Formatted Expand computer hard drive storage instantly! Add extra storage to your Desktop PC / Laptop Without opening up the case Specification: Interface: USB 3.0 Built-In Capacity : 12TB Material: Plastic/PVC USB Data Speed: 5.0 Gbit/s Support Platform: Windows OS Color: White Dimension: 8"(L) x 5"(W) x 1.6"(H) Power Input: 100V ~ 240V (50-60Hz 0.8A) Power Output: 12V 2.0A Package Contents: Avolusion PRO-5X 12TB External Storage (Windows OS) USB 3.0 Cable Power Adapter User Manual 2 Years Warranty

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I had my doubts with the price per terabyte, but after receiving and setting up my back up, I am extremely impressed for the price. This is a great large external back up or whatever wants to be stored on it with an incredible amount of storage. Also, the speed of transfer and right is above expectation..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Inexpensive and works great!
reviews.reviewText: I use many drives for my Plex server. I’ve had A LOT of drive failures. Got this HUGE drive for next to nothing in comparison to the drives I’m replacing. Will buy more as other drives fail. Thanks!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Outstanding drive for the price.
reviews.reviewText: For the price, this is a fantastic deal. The true capacity is just under 11tb, but all drives come in at less than they state, so i was expecting that. copying 10tb of files from my PC to this drive was blazing fast, considering it went through a YSB 3 hub, and the process took about 5 hrs. hard Disk Sentinel finds the drive to be perfect, with at least 1000 days of life to it. For the price per TB, you can't beat it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use these only for file storage. I wanted to like this drive, especially given the high storage space for the excellent price. However, the unit makes a knocking noise about every 3 seconds when idle, and it never stops. It's just enough of a distraction to drive me nuts. Others may not care about this at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Fast shipping, you get about 11tb after setting it. You will have to format the hard drive to your pc which is really easy (look up on YouTube) in order to store data.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This product is really almost 11 tb. It’s works well with my pc, I am satisfied with this purchase. It does make a lil noise but it’s not that bother some to me. If you looking for a cheap external hard drive with memory then I recommend it. If it breaks i will update my review. I believe it comes with 2 years warranty with the company.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good product
reviews.reviewText: Does what it is suppose to do

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great drive for the price
reviews.reviewText: Actually has 11 TB instead of 12 but for the price it works really well for my needs.
No lo compren es una basura yo estoy en proceso de debolverlo aver si me regresan mi dinero
